about_the_game:
Space Dasher pack contains:
- 1 Rider
- 2 New bikes
- 2 Horns
- 1 Emblem

First Name: Ruben
Last Name: Ockels
Surname: Space Dasher
Quote: Let me take you to the stars, babe!

Even though he denies it with a smile, Ruben is what is known as a "stud". When he's not making women drool, he spends his time in orbit around the earth. He doesn't just conquer space though, and when you follow his gaze, you can guess which star he's going to gravitate towards next...

Even though he denies it with a smile, Ruben is what is known as a "stud". When he's not making women drool, he spends his time in orbit around the earth. He doesn't just conquer space though, and when you follow his gaze, you can guess which star he's going to gravitate towards next...

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

name: Moto Racer 4 - Space Dasher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo CPU E6550 at 2.33GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS 640 Mo
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
